CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, February 20, 1954, pg. 12, reads: "Mothers Tea - The Arbordettes, a Y-Teen club which meets at the Centre Avenue YWCA, gave a tea for their mothers on Valentine Day, Feb. 14. Attending the tea were those shown above.  Seated are Mrs. Rachael Holt, Eleanor Davis, Miss Florence Thomas, who spoke; Shirley Smith, Darlene Casey, Mrs. Eloise Pugh, Shirley Mason, Mrs. Jeanne Brown, Mrs. Flossie Holden, Eleanor Davis and Lillian Dunson.  Standing are Carolyn Freeman, Lois Anderson, Patricia Frazier, Jean Holden, Lorraine Pearson, Miss Dorothy Lance, club adviser; Betty Dunson, Yvonne Holt, president; Mrs. Stella Hardy, Betty Grant, Christine Bundridge, Mrs. Bessie Law and Mrs. Gertrude Dunson.
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of Arbordettes Y-teen club members, including seated: Rachael Holt, Eleanor Davis, Florence Thomas, Shirley Smith, Darlene Casey, Eloise Pugh, Shirley Mason, Jeanne Brown, Flossie Holden, Eleanor Davis, Lillian Dunson; standing include: Carolyn Freeman, Lois Anderson, Patricia Frazier, Jean Holden, Lorraine Pearson, Dorothy Lance, Betty Dunson, Yvonne Holt, Stella Hardy, Betty Grant, Christine Bundridge, Bessie Law, and Gertrude Dunson, posed around table for mothers Valentine's Day tea, Centre Avenue YWCA
